NetShop ISP (https://netshop-isp.com.cy), a leading Cloud & VPS Server hosting provider, announced today the availability of Free Trial for VPS servers in its Global infrastructure: Cyprus, Malta, UK, Netherlands (Amsterdam), United States (Los Angeles) and Singapore.

“We want to give our valued customers a taste of what our VPS hosting service can do for them before purchasing a Virtual server with us. Network speed and latency are crucial factors for anyone who deploys VPS servers, so we believe that our Free trial will help thousands of users who would like to test our network and latency first,” said Katerina Burtsava, Head of Sales at NetShop ISP.

Free VPS to help your Business Grow
NetShop ISP’s VPS Hosting service is available to anyone who needs a cheap, reliable, secure and flexible virtual server for hosting a Website, testing new applications, delivering media content worldwide, reselling web hosting or using it as a File storage.

The free VPS trial is to ensure that customers have the opportunity to fully test the network speed, the uptime and the performance of the VPS server and be confident that it can serve them for the purpose they need it.

Moreover, the VPS server can be fully managed through the intuitive myNetShop Client Portal that offers the following VPS management features:

  • SSH and RDP Web Console
  • Installation of a variety of Control Panels
  • Operating System Re-installation
  • Addition of multiple dedicated IPv4 addresses
  • Power off/on and Reboots


How to Get your Free VPS Trial

The VPS Trial service by NetShop ISP is completely Free, with no hidden fees, no credit card requirement and zero obligations.

To request a Free VPS for 24-48 hours please contact sales@netshop-isp.com.cy and a Sales team member will swiftly contact you with further details for your Free VPS trial service activation.

Press Release Source: https://netshop-isp.com.cy/blog/free...by-netshop-isp


About NetShop ISP

NetShop Internet Services is an Award Winning Data Center Services & Server Hosting Provider with privately-owned Infrastructure in Cyprus, Malta, United Kingdom, Netherlands, Singapore, Los Angeles (US West) and Hong Kong.

Since its launch in 2004, the company has been actively involved in the Financial Markets (Forex, Banking), the Online Gambling (iGaming) and the Blockchain industries by developing and maintaining a reliable and cost-effective infrastructure environment for high-profile businesses. Moreover, the continuous investment in innovation and technology has allowed NetShop ISP to continually optimize its service offerings to deliver the best price-quality ratio on the market.

NetShop ISP was voted as the 'Best Services Provider of the Year' in the SBC Awards 2020 where it also ranked as Finalist under the category 'Leader of the Year'. The company has also won the Award of 'Best iGaming Service Provider' twice (CEEG Awards, Budapest & SEG Awards,Milan) and Ranked Finalist in the 'Best Hosting Services' Award category at the Malta Gaming Awards in 2019.
